name: Smoke Dance at Delphi
description:
Smoke Dance at Delphi is an example, for the University of Kent's Ancient Worlds in Digital Gaming class, of the kind of game that could form the basis of the Final Project.

Smoke Dance at Delphi is an enigmatic reflection on William Golding's final novel, The Double Tongue, posthumously published in 1995. That book describes ancient Delphi in troubled times, from the viewpoint of the Oracle herself.
